ingredient_list.text: 4 ripe peaches, halved if possible or cut in large chunks

method.text: Lightly toast the almonds in a pan over medium heat, and reserve for later
Place the butter and half the sugar in the pan. When the sugar begins to melt, add the peaches skin-side down and cook until the bottoms begin to brown (about 5 minutes)
Add the rum, and the remaining sugar and continue caramelizing for 1 more minute
Turn the peaches over to brown the flesh sides (about 1 minute) and add in most of the almonds
Finely grate over the lemon zest and stir into the caramel, then immediately serve and sprinkle the almonds over

notes.text: Try adding all the sugar at the start

title: Grilled Peaches with Rum, Almond, Vanilla
